duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform ultrasound studies for diagnosis and treatment.
Exercise independent judgment and initiative in performing ultrasound procedures.
Interpret and analyze ultrasound images to provide accurate diagnoses and support treatment planning.
Coordinate with other healthcare professionals to ensure comprehensive patient care and treatment.
Maintain accurate patient records and ensure compliance with regulatory standards.

education_certification.credential: Successful completion of an ultrasound training program.
Ultrasound registry by ARDMS or ARRT (ultrasound) and vascular registry by ARDMS, ARRT or CCI.
Extensive prior work experience as an ultrasound technologist may be substituted for formal education.
Shift hours: 8 a.m. - 4:30 p.m., Monday/Tuesday & Monday-Wednesday
